creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: purple band with black edges; three braided tassels at one end; loose fringe at opposite end; decorated with variegated flowers in pink, red, orange at one end and organic designs similar to bunches of grapes in similar colors at opposite end; contemporary paper label: "100% COTTON/ MADE IN GUATEMALA"
dimension: 81 x 1 3/8 in. (205.74 x 3.49 cm) (without fringe or tassels)
title: Hair band or belt (?)
